description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Germany's energy program; the 4th International Television contest with 39 countries from 25 countries; an urban development scheme to make the city of Hanover more liveable; exhibition of the art of an Indian in Bonn; the Max Blanck Institute's new building in Berlin; the German basketball championships in Heidelberg.
